meanings.definition: Not willed or intended by someone.
meanings.sent1: The untwilled mistake was completely accidental.
meanings.sent2: Her untwilled laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The untwilled mix-up of the twins caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: The untwilled chaos in the kitchen resembled a tornado.
meanings.sent5: The untwilled decision to take a different path changed everything.

meanings.definition: Not controlled or directed by someone's will.
meanings.sent1: The untwilled behavior of the puppy surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The untwilled growth of the plants in the garden amazed the gardener.
meanings.sent3: His untwilled dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The untwilled river flowed freely through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The untwilled wind carried the scent of flowers across the field.
